description:
Population Raster Kiribati 2020

Data Input: Household locations from 2018 Household Listing conducted using Survey Solutions CAPI (Computer Assisted Personal Interview). 
Year Population Growth Rate of 1.64 % has been applied to update population up to 2020

Household locations vector layer has been transformed into a 100m resolution raster.
name: Kiribati_Population_Grid_2020
